authors: Lucey,S.,  K. Aydin, S. Gaichas, and  A.Whitehouse
background_text: Rpath is an R implementation of the Ecopath mass balance and Ecosim dynamic food web algorithms geared towards fisheries research; Ecopath/Ecosim models have seen worldwide use in the study of fisheries interactions with marine food webs. Rpath is designed to allow for cross-platform use and to aid in the reproducibility of studies using this framework.
tool_name: R implementation of the Ecopath with Ecosim
references: S.M.Lucey, S. K. Gaichasa, and K. Y. Aydin. 2020. Conducting reproducible ecosystem modeling using the open source mass balance model Rpath. Ecological Modelling 427. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ecolmodel.2020.109057
